ruleContent.content:
<js>
var url = getUrl().replace(/\/$/,'')
//java.log(url)
//å¤„ç†å¼ºåˆ¶ç™»å½•
var nn = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
var coks = nn.split('; '); 
ckk = coks.filter(item => !item 
.startsWith("lf_reader_num")).join('; ');
cookie.setCookie(url,ckk);

//è‡ªåŠ¨å¤„ç†éªŒè¯
let html = src;

function txt(sr) {
    let text;
    if (src.includes("æ»‘åŠ¨éªŒè¯")) {
        let headers = {
             'User-Agent': "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Safari/537.36",
            "Referer": baseUrl
        };
        try {
            let s = src.match(/src=\"(\/huadong[^"]+)/)[1];
            let sr = java.get(url + s, headers).body()
            eval(sr.match(/(key=\".+?,value=\"[^;]+?\;)/)[1]);
            let va = getval(value);
            let codeul = url + sr.match(/([^"]+yanzheng_huadong\.php[^"]+)/)[1] + `${key}&value=${va}`;
            let ck = java.get(codeul, headers);
            java.log("éªŒè¯Cookieï¼š" + JSON.stringify(ck.cookies()));
            java.toast("æ£€æµ‹åˆ°éªŒè¯,å°è¯•è‡ªåŠ¨å¤„ç†â€¦â€¦");
            let tx = java.ajax(baseUrl);
            html = tx;
            text = java.getString('.read-content@html', tx);
        } catch (error) {
            java.log(error);
            text = "è‡ªåŠ¨éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·é‡è¯•!";
        }
    } else {
        text = java.getString('.read-content@html', src);
    }
    return text;
}

let text = txt(html);

//å¤„ç†é‡æ–°è·å–æ–‡æœ¬æ—¶å¯èƒ½ä¼šå‡ºç°çš„é”™è¯¯ã€‚
let retryCount = 0;
const maxRetries = 3;
let result;
while (retryCount < maxRetries) {
    if (text != false && text !== "") {
        result = text;
        break;
    } else {
        retryCount++;
        text = txt(html);
        Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(400);
        java.toast(`æœªè·å–åˆ°æ–‡æœ¬ï¼Œæ­£åœ¨é‡è¯•...ï¼ˆå½“å‰ç¬¬${retryCount}æ¬¡é‡è¯•ï¼‰`);
    }
}

if (retryCount === maxRetries) {
    result = "é‡è¯•ä¸‰æ¬¡ä»ç„¶æœªè·å–åˆ°æ–‡æœ¬ï¼Œè¯·æ£€æŸ¥ç½‘ç»œçŠ¶å†µã€‚"
}
result;
</js>

};

		[type,key]=key.split(/:([\w\W]+)?/,2)

			[key,page]=String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
			type="name"
			}
			books=$.books
	for (let i in books){
    books[i]["id"]=i
    booklist.push(books[i])
    }
    Regkey=createRegExp(key)

  if(/(pornrate|score|update|word)/.test($.sortType)||sortType){

  	}
  if (booklist.length>0&&page==0)java.toast(`\nâœ…æˆåŠŸè·å–${booklist.length}æœ¬ä¹¦ç±`)

  booklist=getl(booklist,page);

	}
	$=checkData()

	}

	booklist = booklist.filter(b => String(b[type]).match(Regkey))
	if(/(pornrate|score|update|word)/.test($.sortType)||sortType) {

		booklist.sort((a, b) => getSortValue(a, st)-getSortValue(b, st))
	}
 if (!$.order) {
 	booklist.reverse()

} else {

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var url = source.key
//å¤„ç†å¼ºåˆ¶ç™»å½•
var nn = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
var coks = nn.split('; '); 
ckk = coks.filter(item => !item 
.startsWith("lf_reader_num")).join('; ');
cookie.setCookie(url,ckk);

//è‡ªåŠ¨å¤„ç†éªŒè¯
let html = src;

function txt(sr) {
    let text;
    if (src.includes("æ»‘åŠ¨éªŒè¯")) {
        let headers = {
            "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 9) Mobile Safari/537.36",
            "Referer": baseUrl
        };
        try {
            let s = src.match(/src=\"(\/huadong[^"]+)/)[1];
            let sr = java.get(url + s, headers).body()
            eval(sr.match(/(key=\".+?,value=\"[^;]+?\;)/)[1]);
            let va = getval(value);
            let codeul = url + sr.match(/([^"]+yanzheng_huadong\.php[^"]+)/)[1] + `${key}&value=${va}`;
            let ck = java.get(codeul, headers);
            java.log("éªŒè¯Cookieï¼š" + JSON.stringify(ck.cookies()));
            java.toast("æ£€æµ‹åˆ°éªŒè¯,å°è¯•è‡ªåŠ¨å¤„ç†â€¦â€¦");
            let tx = java.ajax(baseUrl);
            html = tx;
            text = java.getString('#chapterContent@html', tx);
        } catch (error) {
            java.log(error);
            text = "è‡ªåŠ¨éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·é‡è¯•!";
        }
    } else {
        text = java.getString('#chapterContent@html', src);
    }
    return text;
}

let text = txt(html);

//å¤„ç†é‡æ–°è·å–æ–‡æœ¬æ—¶å¯èƒ½ä¼šå‡ºç°çš„é”™è¯¯ã€‚
let retryCount = 0;
const maxRetries = 3;
let result;
while (retryCount < maxRetries) {
    if (text != false && text !== "") {
        result = text;
        break;
    } else {
        retryCount++;
        text = txt(html);
        Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(400);
        java.toast(`æœªè·å–åˆ°æ–‡æœ¬ï¼Œæ­£åœ¨é‡è¯•...ï¼ˆå½“å‰ç¬¬${retryCount}æ¬¡é‡è¯•ï¼‰`);
    }

gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

	}

	let headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};
paramSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key));

params['sign']=paramSign;
headers['sign']=headerSign;

option = {'headers':headers};

	return last2

eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    var body = '{"operationName":"searchComicAndAuthorQuery","variables":{"keyword":"' + e + '"},"query":"query searchComicAndAuthorQuery($keyword: String!) {
  searchComicsAndAuthors(keyword: $keyword) {
    comics {
      id
      title
      status
      year
      imageUrl
      authors {
        id
        name
        __typename
      }
      categories {
        id
        name
        __typename
      }
      dateUpdated
      monthViews
      views
      favoriteCount
      lastBookUpdate
      lastChapterUpdate
      __typename
    }
    authors {
      id
      name
      chName
      enName
      wikiLink
      comicCount
      views
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}"}';
    return Get('url') + '/api/query,{"body":' + body + ',"headers":{"Content-Type":"application/json"},"method":"POST"}';
}(key));
</js>

var Url = Get('url') + '/comics';
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(Url));
var list = J.select('.pl-7')[2] ? J.select('.pl-7')[2].select('a') : [];
O1 = `{{get('o1',Get('o'))}}`;
P1 = `{{get('p1',Get('p'))}}`;
Q1 = `{{get('q1',Get('q'))}}`;
R1 = `{{get('r1',Get('r'))}}`;
T1 = `{{get('t1',Get('t'))}}`;
for (i in list) {
    var kind = String(list[i].select('a').attr('href')).replace(/.*comics\??/, '');
    kind = kind == '' ? '' : (kind + '&');
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/comics?${O1}${P1}${kind}${T1}${Q1}${R1}page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(list[i].text(), url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;

var document = JsDom.parse(src);

var scripts = document.select("script");

var result = []; // ç”¨äºå­˜å‚¨æœ€ç»ˆçš„ JSON æ•°æ®

for (var i = 0; i < scripts.size(); i++) {
    var script = scripts.get(i);
    var scriptContent = script.data();

    // åŒ¹é… self.__next_f.push çš„å†…å®¹
    var regex = /self\.__next_f\.push\((.*)\)/gs; // ä½¿ç”¨ /gs ä¿®é¥°ç¬¦åŒ¹é…å¤šè¡Œ
    var matches = [];
    var match;

    // éå†æ‰€æœ‰åŒ¹é…ç»“æœï¼Œä¿ç•™æœ€åä¸€ä¸ª
    while ((match = regex.exec(scriptContent)) !== null) {
        matches.push(match[1]);
    }

    // åªå¤„ç†æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªåŒ¹é…çš„å†…å®¹
    if (matches.length > 0) {
        var content = matches[matches.length - 1]; // è·å–æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªåŒ¹é…çš„å†…å®¹

        // é¢„å¤„ç†ï¼šå°†è‹±æ–‡é€—å·ï¼ˆ,ï¼‰æ›¿æ¢ä¸º ",\n"
        content = content.replace(/,/g, ",\n");

        // æ‰“å°é¢„å¤„ç†åçš„ç»“æœ
        //java.log(content);

        // åŒ¹é… "children":"(.*)" å’Œ "href":"(.*)" çš„æ­£åˆ™è¡¨è¾¾å¼
        var childrenRegex = /.*?"children.*?":.*?"(.*)\\"/g;
        var hrefRegex = /.*?"href.*?":.*?"(.*)\\"/g;
        var imgRegex = /.*?"src.*?":.*?"(.*)\\/g;

        var childrenMatches = [];
        var hrefMatches = [];
        var imgMatches = [];

        // æå–åŒ¹é…çš„å†…å®¹
        while ((match = childrenRegex.exec(content)) !== null) {
            // è¿‡æ»¤æ‰ä»¥ "$" å¼€å¤´çš„ children å†…å®¹
            if (!match[1].startsWith("$")) {
                childrenMatches.push(match[1]);
            }
        }
        while ((match = hrefRegex.exec(content)) !== null) {
            // åªåŒ¹é…ä»¥ "/comic.*" å¼€å¤´çš„ href å†…å®¹
            if (match[1].startsWith("/comic")) {
                hrefMatches.push(match[1]);
            }
        }
        while ((match = imgRegex.exec(content)) !== null) {
            // åªåŒ¹é…ä»¥ ".jpg" ç»“å°¾çš„ src å†…å®¹
            if (match[1].endsWith(".jpg")) {
                imgMatches.push(match[1]);
            }
        }

        // ä»ç¬¬2ä¸ª "children" å¼€å§‹å¤„ç†
        var startIdx = 2; // ç¬¬2ä¸ªå…ƒç´ çš„ç´¢å¼•ä¸º12
        if (childrenMatches.length > startIdx) {
            // æŒ‰æ¯5ä¸ªchildrenåˆ†ç»„
            for (var j = 0; j < hrefMatches.length; j++) {
                var group = {
